title: Beacon.

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Beacon. is an unused scenery object that does not appear anywhere. Presumably, it was meant to appear somewhere on the graphically updated version of Crandor, that was reworked along with the Dragon Slayer I quest. At some stage, the Beacon would have lit on fire. However, for unknown reasons it was not included in the game. As a result, it has never been present in Old School RuneScape.

The Beacon. is an unused scenery object that does not appear anywhere. The '''Beacon.''' is an unused scenery object that does not appear anywhere. Presumably, it was meant to appear somewhere on the graphically updated version of [[Crandor]], that was reworked along with the [[Dragon Slayer I]] quest. At some stage, the Beacon would have lit on fire. However, for unknown reasons it was not included in the game. As a result, it has never been present in ''Old School RuneScape''.
